theStarKnight:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theStarKnight:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theStarKnight:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theStarKnight:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theStarKnight:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theStarKnight:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theStarKnight:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theStarKnight:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theStarKnight:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theStarKnight:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theStarKnight:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theStarKnight:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theStarKnight:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theStarKnight:Playtester_SK.NAME: Playtest Card
theStarKnight:Playtester_SK.DESCRIPTION: Innate. N: Upgrade your cards. NL Gain [G] [G] [G] [G] [G]

theStarKnight:DeathGrip_SK.NAME: Death Grip
theStarKnight:DeathGrip_SK.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thestarknight:Constricted. NL Enemy loses !theStarKnight:SecondMagic! Strength.

theStarKnight:Stomp_SK.NAME: Stomp
theStarKnight:Stomp_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. thestarknight:Murder: Draw !M! card, and gain !M! energy

theStarKnight:FrenziedStrike_SK.NAME: Frenzied Strike
theStarKnight:FrenziedStrike_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! less card next turn. Shuffle a NL Frenzied Strike into your draw pile.

theStarKnight:SolarFlare_SK.NAME: Solar Flare
theStarKnight:SolarFlare_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. Refund half X rounded down.

theStarKnight:KnifeGame_SK.NAME: Knife Game
theStarKnight:KnifeGame_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL your thestarknight:Madness NL !theStarKnight:SecondMagic! times.

theStarKnight:DarkHeart_SK.NAME: Dark Heart
theStarKnight:DarkHeart_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and gain block equal to your thestarknight:Madness.
theStarKnight:DarkHeart_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage and gain block equal to twice your thestarknight:Madness.

theStarKnight:Finish_SK.NAME: Finish
theStarKnight:Finish_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half the targets missing HP.

theStarKnight:CleavingBlow_SK.NAME: Cleaving Blow
theStarKnight:CleavingBlow_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, doubled against minions. If this kills the target, gain !M! energy.

theStarKnight:VoidStrike_SK.NAME: Void Strike
theStarKnight:VoidStrike_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a random(not random) card from your hand. Ethereal.

theStarKnight:OrbitalStrike_SK.NAME: Orbital Strike
theStarKnight:OrbitalStrike_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! block. Shuffle this card into your library.

theStarKnight:MeteorBlast_SK.NAME: Meteor Blast
theStarKnight:MeteorBlast_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. (Upgraded: deal !M! damage to ALL enemies)

theStarKnight:HammerTime_SK.NAME: Hammer Time
theStarKnight:HammerTime_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Shuffle a *Heavy *Metal into your deck.

theStarKnight:HeavyMetal_SK.NAME: Heavy Metal
theStarKnight:HeavyMetal_SK.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, NL gain !M! strength and lose !M! dexterity. NL Unplayable. Retain.

theStarKnight:Helios_SK.NAME: Helios
theStarKnight:Helios_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Retain. NL When retained, gain Vulnerable.

theStarKnight:Hemorrhage_SK.NAME: Hemorrhage
theStarKnight:Hemorrhage_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! thestarknight:Ichor NL Lose 2 HP.

theStarKnight:OblivionShard_SK.NAME: Oblivion Shard
theStarKnight:OblivionShard_SK.DESCRIPTION: thestarknight:Memory NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn.

theStarKnight:Gnaw_SK.NAME: Gnaw
theStarKnight:Gnaw_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!. NL Gain HP equal to the unblocked damage.

theStarKnight:GhostArmor_SK.NAME: Ghost Armor
theStarKnight:GhostArmor_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Lose !M! max HP.

theStarKnight:StrangeMatter_SK.NAME: Strange Matter
theStarKnight:StrangeMatter_SK.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, exhaust a card in your hand and add a *Strange *Matter to your hand. When exhausted, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theStarKnight:NeutronBurst_SK.NAME: Neutron Burst
theStarKnight:NeutronBurst_SK.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Shuffle a *Strange *Matter into your library.

theStarKnight:IchorShield_SK.NAME: Ichor Shield
theStarKnight:IchorShield_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 2 thestarknight:Ichor to the attacker.

theStarKnight:GatherMass_SK.NAME: Gather Mass
theStarKnight:GatherMass_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Next turn gain !M! temporary strength and !theStarKnight:SecondMagic! energy.

theStarKnight:DarkTract_SK.NAME: Dark Tract
theStarKnight:DarkTract_SK.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, discard !M! card. NL When gained, gain 2 max HP.
theStarKnight:DarkTract_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, discard !M! cards. NL When gained, gain 2 max HP.

theStarKnight:PulsatingShard_SK.NAME: Pulsating Shard
theStarKnight:PulsatingShard_SK.DESCRIPTION: thestarknight:Memory NL Gain [E] and lose one HP at the start of your turn.
theStarKnight:PulsatingShard_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thestarknight:Memory NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn.

theStarKnight:CacconShard_SK.NAME: Caccon Shard
theStarKnight:CacconShard_SK.DESCRIPTION: thestarknight:Memory NL Gain !M! HP at the start of your turn.

theStarKnight:ColdShard_SK.NAME: Cold Shard
theStarKnight:ColdShard_SK.DESCRIPTION: thestarknight:Memory NL Gain !B! block at the start of your turn.

theStarKnight:Impurity_SK.NAME: Impurity
theStarKnight:Impurity_SK.DESCRIPTION: Choose and discard !M! cards in your library.

theStarKnight:Glare_SK.NAME: Glare
theStarKnight:Glare_SK.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to all enemies, gain !B! block.

theStarKnight:EventHorizon_SK.NAME: Event Horizon
theStarKnight:EventHorizon_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block, NL exhaust your hand

theStarKnight:HeatDeath_SK.NAME: Heat Deat
theStarKnight:HeatDeath_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your thestarknight:Madness !M!.

theStarKnight:Ignition_SK.NAME: Ignition
theStarKnight:Ignition_SK.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses HP equal to twice their thestarknight:Ichor. Draw a card.

theStarKnight:DarkImpulse_SK.NAME: Dark Impulse
theStarKnight:DarkImpulse_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your madness. Exhaust.
theStarKnight:DarkImpulse_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your madness.

theStarKnight:MadSlash_SK.NAME: Mad Slash
theStarKnight:MadSlash_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your madness to all enemies.
theStarKnight:MadSlash_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice your madness to all enemies.

theStarKnight:Vengance_SK.NAME: Vengance
theStarKnight:Vengance_SK.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this would be exhausted, play it.

theStarKnight:TowerShield_SK.NAME: Tower Shield
theStarKnight:TowerShield_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Retain. When retained, gain 2 Weak.

theStarKnight:IchorSpray_SK.NAME: Ichor Spray
theStarKnight:IchorSpray_SK.DESCRIPTION: Apply Weak and !M! Ichor to each enemy.

theStarKnight:Terror_SK.NAME: Terror
theStarKnight:Terror_SK.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card. NL Gain [G] [G] NL Ethereal.

theStarKnight:UnstableBlock_SK.NAME: Unstable Block
theStarKnight:UnstableBlock_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL When exhausted deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theStarKnight:Radiant_SK.NAME: Radiant
theStarKnight:Radiant_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all debuffs. NL Gain 3 Artifact.

theStarKnight:BleedingEdge_SK.NAME: Bleeding Edge
theStarKnight:BleedingEdge_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! vulnerable. Whenever you attack an enemy, apply 1 Ichor to them.

theStarKnight:Atlas_SK.NAME: Atlas
theStarKnight:Atlas_SK.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thestarknight:Plated_Armor. Shuffle a *Heavy *Metal into your deck.

theStarKnight:AccretionDisk_SK.NAME: Accretion Disk
theStarKnight:AccretionDisk_SK.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn add a *Pulsar to your hand.
theStarKnight:AccretionDisk_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn add an upgraded *Pulsar to your hand.

theStarKnight:Pulsar_SK.NAME: Pulsar
theStarKnight:Pulsar_SK.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

theStarKnight:IchorFlood_SK.NAME: Ichor Flood
theStarKnight:IchorFlood_SK.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn apply 1 thestarknight:Ichor to each enemy.
theStarKnight:IchorFlood_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn apply 1 thestarknight:Ichor to each enemy.

theStarKnight:Singularity_SK.NAME: Singularity
theStarKnight:Singularity_SK.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain !M! Constricted and apply 2 Constricted to each enemy.
theStarKnight:Singularity_SK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the start of your turn gain !M! Constricted and apply 2 Constricted to each enemy.
